disclaimer_message: This program is Blue Archive Mod Manager. Mods are unofficial assets. Use at your own risk.
title: Blue Archive Mod Loader
description: Click the button to select a .bundle file.
status_scanning_drive: Scanning drive {{drive}} for BlueArchive.exe, this may take a while...
status_not_found: Could not find the game automatically. Please select the path manually.
no_mods_installed: No mods installed yet. Click 'Select Mod File' to add one.
apply_mods_confirm_message: This will modify game files. Are you sure you want to apply all CHECKED mods?
uninstall_mods_confirm_message: This will restore original files. Are you sure you want to uninstall all UNCHECKED mods?
operation_failed: Operation failed. Check the console for details.
game_path_not_configured: Game path is not configured. Cannot proceed.
action_status_launching: Attempting to launch the game via Steam...
